about_the_game:
The Last Saviour: Search of Truth is a first-person fantasy story with elements of shooter, puzzle-solving, strategy and survival. All this is backed up by mysterious frightening events that have occurred since the Middle Ages.

You woke up in an abandoned house in the middle of a mysterious sequoia forest. In this area, sectarians conducted an experiment to create one of their deities, nicknamed "Great". It has a powerful magical power and should appear in this world under the guise of a werewolf, but the research did not go according to plan. You have to solve the mystery and understand the essence of such a grandiose being.

And here, in addition to one global problem, many others appear. Your provisions that were found in the houses are not enough, and in order to survive, you will have to use the skills of a hunter, but the main thing is not to meet a pack of wolves or a brown bear.

Every night there is a meeting with the "Great". There is no way to avoid a meeting, if you do not come to him yourself, then he will come to you. After the fog rises, the "Great" will immerse your mind in an illusion. There, this creature will show a deep history of its own origin, up to medieval times. To demonstrate how the battles between the "ARZ" coalition and the "Mainster" sect were fought in the world.

In this fantasy, you will be in various guises, and the tasks in each of them are completely different. First, you will be a scientist in one of the Arctic laboratories. Then there will be an immersion in the appearance of a soldier who is on a special mission in the desert canyons. After you become the commander of Operation Gloom, and demonstrate the skills of conducting a strategy, and will manage both tank divisions and air attacks. You will also make your way in a submarine to the defended tropical island, and conduct reconnaissance of the territory under the heat of enemy weapons. And in the end, you will meet with him, in the main temple of the Ancients.

Immerse yourself in history, immerse yourself in the guise of each person, and get to the truth. After all, only You can do this, the last Saviour!

Features

  • Cooperative mode
  • Elements of survival and hunting
  • Personal transport
  • Interweaving of genres
  • The singularity of the plot
  • Wide range and variety of musical accompaniment
